name: neo4j-proxy
description: Neo4j is an open source Graph Database. It allows you to efficiently manage highly connected data. This DC/OS package is about a proxy to access your cluster from outside of DC/OS. You probably want to do this only for debugging purpose. You can access the cluster via officially supported drivers from most languages. Installation documentation can be found at https://github.com/dcos/examples/tree/master/1.8/neo4j
preInstallNotes: This DC/OS Service is currently EXPERIMENTAL. There may be bugs, incomplete features, incorrect documentation, or other discrepancies. Default credentials are neo4j/dcos. Please change them on first use.
postInstallNotes:
Neo4j has been successfully installed.
Documentation can be found at https://neo4j.com/docs and https://neo4j.com/developer

licenses.name: AGPL v3 license or Neo4j Commercial License
